person.persName: Clement Sidney Hill (Marion County, Kentucky, attorney, state representative, and U.S. representative)

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, attorney, state representative, and United States representative. Marion County, Kentucky, native. Attended St. Maryâ€™s College in St. Mary, Kentucky. Attorney in Lebanon, Kentucky from 1837. Served in the Kentucky House of Representatives in 1839. Attorney in Marion County in 1850. Owned eight enslaved persons in Marion County in 1850. Elected as a Whig to the Thirty-third congress. Served in the Thirty-third United States Congress from 1853 to 1855. Attorney in Marion County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Marion County in 1860.
